Articles.Content: Once you test them, recoil crushes the hill.
This never happens because it is maglev and there is no recoil. sorry. Still My hill.

I am back! i destroy all your hills.

your craters.
I fill in my craters. My roughly 300 hills on assorted planets and moons throughout the Kerbol system.
You have forgotten which hill is *the* hill.
That one is on kerbin. I don't have that one, but i have roughly 2,743,679,547 others scattered around the solar system. including one right next to 'the' hill.

They build Amber on that hill.

[Amber hill chronicles](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/The_Chronicles_of_Amber#The_geography_of_Amber).

P.S.  

Also that means that The Hill of this thread is named Kolvir.  

Any other hill is its reflection.

**Edited <time datetime="2018-06-11T05:33:35Z" title="06/11/2018 05:33  AM" data-short="6 yr">June 11, 2018</time> by kerbiloid**

No one bothers to click that link, so they all fail to see the significance of the hill.

My hill.

I create a new save, with the hill on an inaccessible point on Kerbin. You also reach the maximum memory limit on the computer, so you can't create any more saves.

My hill!

**Edited <time datetime="2018-06-11T07:26:45Z" title="06/11/2018 07:26  AM" data-short="6 yr">June 11, 2018</time> by Ho Lam Kerman**

I convince Windows Defender that your save is a malicious file and it deletes it.

I copy the backup of my hill from a USB drive.

My hill.
I shoot FTL Missiles at the hill and take it. My hill.
As the missiles are FTL, they arrive a day later, when you ~~are~~ were walking around "your" hill.
This does not happen as I actually cannot be at the hill until The missiles hit. My hill.

I suddenly cut the planet into 512 pieces, each one I terrarform into large hills.

My 512 hils.
I suddenly reform the planet. My planet.

I stall everyone by making them watch all 3 Lord of the rings movies. I take the hill.

My hill.
I don't take your offer. My hill.
I make myself huge and blot out the sun with my massive body. You freeze to death. My hill.
I happen to be wearing a pressure and heating suit at the time, so still my hill. SORRY! ![:D](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_cheesy.gif ":D")

I shrink down.

You see those shard wings in my profile picture?  

I shoot those at you. you are stabbed through every part of you body.

My hill.
I have a forcefield around me, so nothing happens. My hill.

Your improved forcefield appears to become self-sufficient. It doesn't need external energy.  

Alas, this means you can't switch it off and stay inside.  

Btw it blocks all signals from within.

A hill with a guy frozen in a small forcefield sphere. Evrybody can look at him just for 1 piece of gold.
Wrong. Does not happen. My hill.

I launch explosive ore tanks at the hill.

My flattened hill.
I refill the hill with you on it. My hill with bunker and insanely large defense grid.
